description: Adds an access policy to the specified store.

parameters.name: s3AccessPointArn
parameters.description: The S3 access point ARN where you want to put the access policy.

parameters.name: s3AccessPolicy
parameters.description: The resource policy that controls S3 access to the store.

nested_items.name: s3AccessPointArn
nested_items.description: The S3 access point ARN that now has the access policy.

nested_items.name: storeId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services-generated Sequence Store or Reference Store ID.

nested_items.name: storeType
nested_items.description: The type of store associated with the access point.
